segments.text: I see the boy reaching into the cookie jar, and I can’t help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so determined to get those cookies, even if he has to risk falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so hopeful, like she’s waiting for the best treat ever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and I’m a little worried for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely missing the whole scene, and it’s kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making such a mess, but she’s just drying that plate like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the kids are working together to get what they want.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, and it’s a shame no one is paying attention to it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to make it, but I’m still holding my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is chaotic, but it’s also kind of charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before the stool tips over.
segments.speaker: PAR
